name: number_captcha
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool captcha_v2.
Tool description:  SmileMe's Captcha provide a Captcha image for you. Just call and the API will return the info Captcha ( include image base64, id, value ...) 
API description: Captcha code is number format.

- params: length is number (from 1 to  8, default is 6)

length.description: Length of the numeric CAPTCHA, ranging from 1 to 8. Default is 4.
